descriptionHtml:
hello evryone.

some new texture\'s i made for the apprentice mage robe,
the texture are male only atm.

plz  feel free to use them in ur future mods or projects. :)

I will be updating this mod from time to time. 
no major changes until the creation kit has been released.

____________________________________________________________________
install 
unpack the zip file to skyrim -> data
texture\'s are located in skyrim - data - texture - clothes - mageapprentice - m 
there are 4 folders take what texture u want and copy this in the folder - m 
default is red.

plz feel free to contact me. 
ty for reading this and have a good day. cheers :)
author: Aindra
